ygData.subject: RE: Re: Mitty the Kitty
ygData.msgSnippet: That is my experience as well.  IF I am lucky, I can kill her and still be at 1/2 mana (177 wis at level 32).  I have found that there really is only two ways
ygData.messageBody:
That is my experience as well. IF I am lucky, I can kill her and still be
at 1/2 mana (177 wis at level 32). I have found that there really is only
two ways to kill her - 1> clear out the 4 Priestesses that are beside her
and out front or, 2> pull her to the zone.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

> From: Martyn Adams <martyn-adams@...>
>
>
> Renmorum Lifespinner wrote:
> >
> > From: "Renmorum Lifespinner" <renmorum@...>
> >
> > Well, on the Karana server she was definitely green to me at
> L30. She also
> > went down with two Wraths.
>
> She is green to me at lvl 31 and I've never managed to down her in less
> than four wraths so I don't really believe that she goes down in two
> wraths.. (and that is without her being healed since I cleared out all
> the other kitty's that heal her).
>
> Vinamin
> Son of Innoruuk
> Priest of The Lady
> Erollisi Marr
